verses.name: Leviticus 26:8
verses.text: And five of you shall chase an hundred, and an hundred of you shall put ten thousand to flight: and your enemies shall fall before you by the sword.

verses.name: Leviticus 26:9
verses.text: For I will have respect unto you, and make you fruitful, and multiply you, and establish my covenant with you.

verses.name: Leviticus 26:10
verses.text: And ye shall eat old store, and bring forth the old because of the new.

verses.name: Leviticus 26:11
verses.text: And I will set my tabernacle among you: and my soul shall not abhor you.

verses.name: Leviticus 26:12
verses.text: And I will walk among you, and will be your God, and ye shall be my people.
